label: Data Retention
description: Privacy practice specifying the retention period for collected user information.
usage:
Apply when the policy specifies how long user data is kept before being deleted, anonymized, or aggregated.

Key attributes to consider:
- Retention Period (required): How long data is kept - indefinitely, limited time, specific stated period
- Retention Purpose (required): Why data is retained - service performance, legal requirements, analytics, security, etc.
- Personal Information Type (required): What type of data the retention policy applies to
